title: OptoII Watchmaker WatchFace
summary: Opto II Customizable Round Android Wear WatchFace Watchmaker LG GWatchR Moto360
description: ***This watchface requires the latest Watchmaker  http://goo.gl/FMxUfY to make sure you can see all of the newest features.*** And of course a round smart watch.Watchface Taps:⌚ Center - Choose from 6 Hands⌚ 12 - Switch between 12 colors⌚ 9 - Switch between 7 fonts⌚ 3 - Zoom the Faces⌚ Temp - New 3 Day Forecast⌚ Step Counter - Google Fit⌚ Battery % - Change Background⌚ Date - Open your Agenda⌚ Tap the 6 - ezShade (defaulted at 40%)The New Zoom (on the 3) will Zoom the numbers or symbols in and out.The new Dim Shade option on the watchface controls how much of a shade you would like in dimmed mode on your watchface to conserve your battery. It really does work!All of the Watchface options can be set on the Watchface.**Cleaned up UI to Optimze Speed**Watch the video to see this watchface in action. New 'Swirl' not even on video yet.Why have 1 watchface when you can have over 1000 different combinations?This watchface uses Watchmaker, an app that runs on your smart watch.Watchmaker is sold seperately.Compatible with Moto 360,LG Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches that are able to run watchmaker
descriptionHTML:
***This watchface requires the latest Watchmaker http://goo.gl/FMxUfY to make sure you can see all of the newest features.*** And of course a round smart watch.


Watchface Taps:
⌚ Center - Choose from 6 Hands
⌚ 12 - Switch between 12 colors
⌚ 9 - Switch between 7 fonts
⌚ 3 - Zoom the Faces
⌚ Temp - New 3 Day Forecast
⌚ Step Counter - Google Fit
⌚ Battery % - Change Background
⌚ Date - Open your Agenda
⌚ Tap the 6 - ezShade
(defaulted at 40%)


The New Zoom (on the 3) will Zoom the numbers or symbols in and out.


The new Dim Shade option on the watchface controls how much of a shade you would like in dimmed mode on your watchface to conserve your battery. It really does work!


All of the Watchface options can be set on the Watchface.


**Cleaned up UI to Optimze Speed**


Watch the video to see this watchface in action. New 'Swirl' not even on video yet.


Why have 1 watchface when you can have over 1000 different combinations?


This watchface uses Watchmaker, an app that runs on your smart watch.
Watchmaker is sold seperately.
Compatible with Moto 360,LG Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, and any other Android Wear round face watches that are able to run watchmaker
comments: Best Watchmaker watch face Still my favorite watch face
recentChanges: ⌚[2.0] Tap the Battery Percentage for Background Change
⌚[1.5] XL Any of the 6 Faces (tap the 3)
